title: amarndavanai ninanindAl
sahitya:
(rAgA:  valaji)   
  amarndavanai ninaindAl arugE ninriDuvAn ninravanai ninaindAl puLLeri parandu varuvAn
mudalai vAi kaLiru kAkka vandadu pOlE emai ANDiDum kamakkaNNan
				(rAgA:  shahAnA)


anupallavi

  tAyumE sinandu kurai kaNDAlum (peTra) avan aparAdham murai kETTODi vandu
kAttiDuvAn kUru munbE en tollai tIrkkum kaNNan
				(rAg  SaNmukhapriyA)


caraNam    ArAi perugum Aramudan karuNai aLLi arunda kuraiyAdavan aruL
anrum inrum enrum kAppAn pErenum ariyA em mAdhavan
